as_a_precaution_against_influence_we_are.message: As a precaution against influence, we are keeping your wife and child in a safe location.

it_is_your_job_to_increase_their_loyalty.message: It is your job to increase their loyalty by editing The Republia Times carefully. Pick only stories that highlight the good things about Republia and its government.

the_public_is_not_loyal_to_the_governmen.message: The public is not loyal to the government.

the_war_with_antegria_is_over_and_the_re.message: The war with Antegria is over and the rebellion uprising has been crushed. Order is slowly returning to Republia.

welcome_to_the_republia_times_you_are_th.message: Welcome to The Republia Times. You are the new editor-in-chief.

you_have_3_days_to_raise_the_public_s_lo.message: You have 3 days to raise the public''s loyalty to 20
